DOC.brief_summary: The investigators intend to screen children who are suspected of having GAS tonsillitis. From each child we will take a throat culture and saliva sample to screen for molecular evidence of GAS.
DOC.brief_title: Detection of Group A Streptococcus (GAS) in Oral Cavity
DOC.criteria: clinical evidence of GAS tonsillitis healthy, no chronic illness not a GAS carrier GAS carrier Active background disease
